documentation.introduction: Cryptohraphers are taking dinner in a restaurant. After finishing their meal, the waitress come to them a tell them that dinner was already paid. Cryptohraphers don´t know if it was paid by some of them or it was paid by Cryptohraphers Association. They are curious, but they respect each other´s privacy. So they use Dinning´s Cryptographers protocol to know, if some of them paid for dinner.
documentation.usage: This plugin represent final stage in Dining Cryptographers protocol. Inputs for this protocol are outputs from Cryptographers. This plugin take all values from input and use operation XOR on them. Result of this operation comes to the output.
